definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Think sports cars and flashy SUVs depreciate the most?
sentences.chinese: 以爲跑車，奢華的越野車折價得最多嗎？

sentences.english: Still, high-end cars and SUVs are generally leaders when it comes to resale value.
sentences.chinese: 高檔轎車和越野車仍然是再售價中的鰲頭。

sentences.english: Already be the luxurious go-anywhere vehicle that money buys with helping Tibet all on the road.
sentences.chinese: 馬路上已經滿是用援藏款買的豪華越野車。

sentences.english: Large size is also an issue, George could only stand in the back seat of the master off-road vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 體型太大問題，喬治只能站在主人越野車的後座上。

sentences.english: And the cars are prepared for the harsh conditions of the north.
sentences.chinese: 這些雪上越野車爲北極的嚴寒環境配備了應對裝備。

sentences.english: For example, the speedometer parts might be assembled into both sports cars and off-road vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 例如，里程錶部件可以組裝到賽車和越野車中。

sentences.english: Now I tumbled inside the SUV as it somersaulted down the ravine. Branches snapped.
sentences.chinese: 現在只有卡在越野車裏，和它一齊在峽谷裏翻着跟頭。

sentences.english: Now I have to convince my wife to give up her S.
sentences.chinese: 現在我必須說服我的妻子放棄她的越野車。

sentences.english: He said Jackson was optimistic as he walked back to his SUV.
sentences.chinese: 他說傑克遜走向他的越野車時顯得很開心。

sentences.english: Therefore, now it is time for you to rule the dirt with Dirt bike dynamites .
sentences.chinese: 因此，現在是時候了，你裁決與越野車炸藥的污垢。

sentences.english: The optional sports package underlines the M-Class′s sporty genes.
sentences.chinese: 可選裝的運動套件加強了新款M級越野車的運動特性。

sentences.english: My father spared 15 minutes to check the spare tires of his SUV.
sentences.chinese: 我爸花了15分鐘去檢查他越野車的備用輪胎。

sentences.english: Lightweight resin center shaft driven 4WD produces sharp acceleration response.
sentences.chinese: 輕巧的樹脂中心軸驅動的越野車生產急劇加速的迴應。

sentences.english: Structure and running conditions of offroad vehicles are more complicated.
sentences.chinese: 越野車結構和運行工況較一般車輛複雜。

sentences.english: If you feel so inclined you can also "wadi-bash", driving in 4x4s along dry river beds.
sentences.chinese: 假如你有意，也可以在乾涸的河牀上駕駛越野車。

definition: Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make
one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
Taiwan equivalent of 奔馳|奔驰[Ben1 chi2]
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
